EmailTemplate.name: Lacerte DPO Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit Lacerte Deferred Payment Option
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Great news! We received your acceptance of our Deferred Payment Option Terms & Conditions and our team has validated your eligibility. The deferred tax software product(s) will be available for download on/after November 8, 2017.
Thank you for choosing Lacerte Tax. We value you as a customer.
Sincerely,
The Lacerte Team
Intuit ProConnect Group
